alert.note: Alert for Aguas Buenas; Barranquitas; Caguas; Ciales; Cidra; Comerio; Corozal; Morovis; Naranjito; Orocovis (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 19 at 9:10AM ADT until September 19 at 3:00PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Aguas Buenas County in Puerto Rico... Barranquitas County in Puerto Rico... Caguas County in Puerto Rico... Ciales County in Puerto Rico... Cidra County in Puerto Rico... Comerio County in Puerto Rico... Corozal County in Puerto Rico... Morovis County in Puerto Rico... Naranjito County in Puerto Rico... Orocovis County in Puerto Rico... * Until 200 PM AST. * At 810 AM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain moving across the warned area. This rainfall in addition to previous rainfall will continue to result in excessive runoff and flash flooding. Mudslides and rockfalls are likely. Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 5 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Heavy rain producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Aguas Buenas; Barranquitas; Caguas; Ciales; Cidra; Comerio; Corozal; Morovis; Naranjito; Orocovis
